channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipped material in the road at Lawrie Park Road., 27th December
item.description:
A substantial amount of fencing panels and other materials have been dumped in the road near the junction with Crystal Palace Park Road. Although not blocking the road entirely, traffic is having to manoeuvre around it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Lawrie Park Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Combination of builders waste and garden waste tipped adjacent to occupied building, 27th December
item.description:
Approx 6m x 4m of waste, wooden pallets and garden cutting tipped along side commercial/domestic property then set alight. LFB extinguished what was alight but a significant quantity could still be burnt presenting additional risk to the property.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fraser Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bin waste dumped Radcliffe House, 27th December
item.description:
Significant Rat issue already present in and around building. Rubbish dumped causing day sightings of large brown rats using the heap as food source. Public health concern. Prompt cleaning required to minimise risk

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anchor Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severe bin overflow ; Rat food source, 27th December
item.description:
Rats cited using bins as food source approx 3pm. Major public health concern in the SE16 2EJ area around Arica house/ estate. Cleaning required urgently to minimise health risk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slippers Place, Bermondsey, Greater London
